EmailTemplate.description: This email is using in survey
EmailTemplate.name: SHP CSAT Survey Email to SCN Employer Contact for billing contact
EmailTemplate.subject: Did we meet your expectations?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Employer_Group_Data__c.BillingContact_Name__c},
Thank you for contacting Sutter Health Services on {!Employer_Group_Data__c.CreatedDate}.
At Sutter Health Services we strive to improve our services through customer feedback. We invite you to provide feedback by taking our four question/short survey. Please click on the link below to access the survey.
http://sutterhealth.force.com/SurveyForce/TakeSurvey?id=a0AG000000VHmo4MAD&cId={!Employer_Group_Data__c.BillingContact_NameId__c}&caId={!Case.Id}&scnid={!Employer_Group_Data__c.Id}
Your survey will expire on {!Employer_Group_Data__c.SCN_Survey_Sent_Date__c} .
Thank you for your time.
Sincerely,
SHP Leadership Team
